scenario_text.value:
You two sure do get along well.
Seeing that makes me feel better.

Well Takuma’s so nice!
I can relax being at his side.

It seems like you and Miu are really close,
Syakomon.
It does? I’m happy to hear it!

I wish Minoru and Saki had such smooth
relationships...

Minoru’s one thing,
but Saki’s whole vibe seems kinda off...

I thought they’d get along swimmingly.
But such intense refusal instead...
Aoi seemed a little uneasy, too...
(I wonder if we’re really gonna be okay...)

We’ll be fine!
We get along so well.

(At least those two leave nothing to
worry about.)
